Translations.Text: Swad111! Ndahiriye kuri Qur’an yuje urwibutso
Nyamara abahakanye bari mu bwibone n’ubwigomeke
Ese ni ibisekuru bingahe tworetse mbere yabo, bigatakamba by’impitagihe
(Abarabu b’ababangikanya-mana) batangajwe no kugerwaho n’umuburizi (Muhamadi) ubakomokamo. Nuko abahakanyi baravuga bati "Uyu ni umurozi w’umubeshyi
Ese arashaka ko imana (zacu) zose ziba Imana imwe? Mu by’ ukuri, iki ni ikintu gitangaje
Maze ibikomerezwa muri bo bigenda bivuga biti "Nimugende munambe ku mana zanyu. Mu by’ukuri, uyu ni umugambi wateguwe
Ibi ntitwigeze tubyumva mu myizerere yo hambere. Ibi nta kindi biri cyo usibye kuba ari ibihimbano
Ese ni we wenyine muri twe waba warahishuriwe urwibutso? Ahubwo barashidikanya ku rwibutso rwanjye (Qur’an), kuko batarasogongera ku bihano byanjye
Ese baba bafite ibigega by’impuhwe za Nyagasani wawe, Umunyembaraga zihebuje, Ugaba bihebuje
Cyangwa baba bafite ubwami bw’ibirere n’isi ndetse n’ibiri hagati yabyo? Niba ari uko bimeze, ngaho nibazamuke mu kirere bakoresheje uburyo ubwo ari bwo bwose (maze bakumire ubutumwa)
Izo ni ingabo zizatsindwa (nk’uko) iz’udutsiko zatsinzwe (mbere)
Mbere yabo (hari benshi) bahinyuye (intumwa); nk’abantu ba Nuhu, aba Adi ndetse na Farawo wari ufite inyubako zitangaje
N’aba Thamudu, abantu ba Lutwi ndetse n’aba Ayikat (b’i Mediyani), bose bari udutsiko
Nta na kamwe muri two katahinyuye intumwa, nuko ibihano byanjye biba impamo
